name: Just Rotate!
description: This is a short game based around the idea that this guy wants his bubblegum and you have to bounce the gum around the map into his mouth for him to be happy. The only action you can take in this game is rotation. With that said, I made this game in only two days because of a crazy schedule. So it's very rushed, but let me know if you'd like to see a more polished version in the future!
